mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ucare.reservation( rev_date, rev_time, ins_no, ins_dt, patient_no ) VALUES( TO_DATE(#{revDate },'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{revTime }, #{insNo }, now(), #{patientNo } )
mapper.select: SELECT A.rev_no AS revNo, A.rev_date AS revDate, A.rev_time AS revTime, A.ins_dt AS insDt, A.patient_no AS patientNo, B.name AS name, B.tel_no AS telNo, CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.ssn, 1, 8), '******') AS ssn, B.insurance_yn AS insurance FROM ucare.reservation A INNER JOIN ucare.patient B ON A.patient_no = B.patient_no ORDER BY A.rev_no DESC
